data: {"About-Me":[{"Title":"A Clean Home = A Happy Home","Content":"Feel the difference a truly clean home makes. A spotless, welcoming space you can be proud of — without the stress. I focus on the details, work with honesty and precision, and take cleaning off your plate so you can focus on what matters most: living your life."}],"Promotions":[{"Title":"Spook-Free Clean","Content":"New customers save $15 on their first deep clean.","Start Date":"10/01/2025","End Date":"10/31/2025"}],"Testimonials":[{"Name (optional)":"Unknown","Content":"Melinda does a wonderful job cleaning!","":"← This is an example"}]}
